attributes.action: STOP THE CULL OF FRIENDLY DOLPHINS IN DENMARK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is to ask for help to stop atrocious custom in Faroe Islands, Denmark of barbaric, cull of 'Calderon' a highly intelligent dolphin that is placid, and friendly. The cull is not for food but a custom to celebrate adulthood. Nothing is being done to prevent this barbarism being committed.
  
As part of the EU Denmark should stop this Cull now. Horrifying pictures are taken by shocked witnesses of dolphins lying slaughtered in a blood coloured sea and then dragged to the beach to be gutted alive.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
